actions.subcommittee: Mining, Forest Management and Bonneville Power Administration
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Mining, Forest Management and Bonneville Power Administration.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mining, Forest Management and Bonneville Power Administration

official_title: A bill to terminate certain authority of the executive branch of the Government which is subject to congressional review unless that authority is approved by an enactment of the Congress.

summary.text: Terminates the authority (formerly subject to congressional veto) of the President under the Mineral Leasing Act of 1920 to make a finding that the exportation of oil is in the national interest (thereby permitting export), unless within 180 days of the enactment of this Act the exercise of that authority is approved by an enactment of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to terminate certain authority of the executive branch of the Government which is subject to congressional review unless that authority is approved by an enactment of the Congress.
